name: Make figures great again
body:
![neck](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dblarremore/make_figures_great_again/master/neck.jpg)

## Installation and Use
Make Figures Great Again (MFGA) is **the** best way to make plots. Period. With nine terrific color palettes, and Python and Adobe modules, MFGA is hands down—and look, we know something about hands here folks—the number one way to elevate the class and impact of your figures. 

### Python installation
    pip install make-figures-great-again
### Python usage example
    # Make a plot with the "neck" color palette (top of this webpage)
    code example here

### Adobe installation
Just download the palettes here

## The 9 simply outstanding color palettes
The amount of orange is a totally normal amount of orange.

![orange](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dblarremore/make_figures_great_again/master/orange.jpg)
